extendedInfo.description: myCurry helps you stay connected to Curry College from wherever you are. Get access to your courses, grades, class schedule, stay informed with the latest campus news, watch videos, find people in the public directory, get in touch instantly, find places on the campus map, get alerts, send messages, listen to WMLN 91.5 FM and more. -----Main Features:â¨â My Messages: Access all your Messages that have not yet been acknowledged, and customize alert settings.â¨â Athletics: View up-to-date news, schedules, and scoresâ Directory: Get in touch with anyone campus-wide, send an email and add that person directly to your phone's address book.Â â Emergency: Access important numbers and information when you need them. Call to report an emergency or get information from the Curry College Information Hotline.Â â Events: Find and keep track of a wide range of Curry College activities, from concerts and art exhibits to lectures.â WMLN 91.5 FM: Tune in to live broadcasts from our campus station!Â â¨â Maps: View campus buildings on the map, see their email address and phone numbersâ Library: Find library resources including location and call number, and even see current availability.Â â Videos: Access Curry College YouTube video content in one easy-to-view place.Â â News: Keep up with all the happenings on and off campus with news from Curry College!â Send Messages: Send messages to groups, individuals and communities.â Dining Services: Access daily and weekly menu, and dining options in campus restaurants.â Ellucian Banner Integration: Get complete access to Curry Web Information Systems (CWIS) on your mobile and access apps like Parking Permits, Grades, Student Registration, Course Assessments, Course Selection Guides, Curry Connect and more..â Create favorites for one click access to preferred apps.

reviews.title: Alumni
reviews.comment: Would be so much better if I could check my email from here
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seth (Alum)
reviews.comment: I wish I could get to my email from here. Also have an athletics link for current students and alumni who are fan\'s of sport teams.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Class on the go.
reviews.comment: I really enjoy this tool. It helps me stay on top of class and team posts without having to jump on the computer each time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its good. Basic. Wish I could view my email with the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Notifications please
reviews.comment: Please provide a way to receive notifications when i receive a new message
reviews.author: shivender kaushik

reviews.title: its ok
reviews.comment: i like it just wish it had the email feature
reviews.author: A Google User
